Key Match Events: India beat New Zealand by four wickets
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli: 'It's a good start to the tournament. We know the job is only half done. It's important for us to stay balanced but to enjoy the moment as well.'
Tom Latham: 'I thought we played reasonably well. We didn't capitalise with the bat in the last 10 overs, but full credit to the way India bowled.'
